str2: A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To have been put away, be stored, be reserved for. From apo and keimai; to be reserved; figuratively, to await.
To be dying, be about to die, wither, decay. From apo and thnesko; to die off.
Once, once for all. Probably from hapas; one time.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
Decision; by extension, a tribunal; by implication, justice.
